summary: A .ESP-file that makes Annekke Crag-Jumper essential (cannot die) and with buffed up stats.
descriptionHtml:
There are those who thinks that Aela the Hunter is the hottest hottie in Skyrim 
and the only way to go when they are choosing companion in the game .. i dont.

In the little miningcommunity called Darkwater Crossing lives Annekke. 
She used to be an adventurer she says - and if you help her out with some bandits OR if you help her daughter Sylgja,
she will follow you if you want to. She does not marry you though as she already is married.
(Her daughter is avaliable for marriage though ..)

I buffed up her stats for heavy armor, archery, one-handed, block, destruction e.t.c.
and gave her some spells and gear that makes her a very good little helper in fights.
She is a \"human missile\" wich means that she fights with ranged weapons rather than
rushing head on into trouble .. keeps her out of the way too.

You will have to provide her with armor and meleeweapon yourself if you want her to have that,
she does have a dagger and a nice bow already .. you might wat to trade with her some .. 

Installation:
Just drop the .esp into your Skyrim/Data folder and make sure the mod is active in the launcher.

Un-installation: Remove the .esp or just de-activate it.
author: Getis
